item.description:
Join us for coffee and conversation! What do you know about L.O.A? Share how you have shifted your experiences now that you are aware of it. What shifts are you making to create a life of pure bliss and ease?

If you rsvp yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Looking forward to seeing everyone.

Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet outside if weather permits or the private room in back from 10a.m.-Noon.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Morning L.O.A. Meetup
